name: Churn Prediction Business User App
description: Churn prediction employs a previously trained model to identify which customers are likely to churn based on historical data.

appStages.name: Introduction
Churn-Prediction

    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Select Model",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "customClass": "m-4",
              "inline": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": "sparkMLEngine",
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "Spark ML Engine",
                  "value": "sparkMLEngine",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "H2O ML Engine",
                  "value": "h2oMLEngine",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "key": "selectMLEngine",
              "type": "radio",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "H2O Model Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run",
              "properties": {
                "execute": "true",
                "readFile": "true",
                "successMessage": "Prediction Has Been Completed",
                "wfId": "4821f08d-510d-401e-8912-a4c264aec25e"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectMLEngine",
                "eq": "h2oMLEngine"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "keyModified": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Spark Model Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run1",
              "properties": {
                "execute": "true",
                "readFile": "true",
                "successMessage": "Prediction Has Been Completed",
                "wfId": "76ac4e55-e070-425d-bd1b-5cc53176297c"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectMLEngine",
                "eq": "sparkMLEngine"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
